desc: Add a component necessary for users of the application to be able to manually select audio inputs (Bluetooth, built-in speakers or headphones) during a video conference using iOS devices. Note, that we already have an application built and UI designed, and just need this additional functionality added.Task:Create the iOS part of the Adobe AIR native extension (ANE) that controls audio routing. The ANE can switch the audio between built-in speakers, a wired headset, a bluetooth headset. In addition, it provides the information about whether a wired and/or bluetooth headset is connected. The ANE has the following main functions:1. setOutput( output ) - sets the audio routing to a certain audio device (speakers, wired headset, bluetooth headset);2. isOutputAvailable( output ) - checks whether the particular audio device is currently available (e.g. a wired headset is connected).The ANE also dispatches an event when some audio device gets connected or disconnected. p.s. In case the above functionality cannot be accomplished in iOS due to platform limitations, the ANE has to be able to invoke the system menu allowing the user to manually select the audio device for the current application.
title: Create the iOS part of the Adobe AIR native extension (ANE) that controls audio routing

desc: Transportation SystemI have 4 cars to take students from their homes to different collage at morning and the way around back to home. So, I need system that allow me and the students to see all online cars that on college trips displayed on a map with some information such as driver name, average speed and current speed.After working hours, each driver can be online to receive ride request as well as student can request a ride at any time (Like: Uber). then system automatically send request to nearest online driver who can accept or reject. If driver reject ride request, it goes to second driver if reject then third driver and if none of drivers accept the request, it return back to user as no driver available. However, if one of drivers accept it, user who request the ride will see the car on the map which will come to him.Although for me as admin I should have admin panel that allow me to manage (add - edit - delete) drivers and cars. display list of users, cars and drivers. Also display drivers’ trip of last three days with trip information's. Trip information include date and time, path on map, average speed and timed car stop location.So, to make it easier for you the main screen has two icons:1-	For subscriber's students to deliver them to their collages.2-	To receive ride requests from any users, want to ride like: Uber.Users functionality:- should be able to register, login and edit profile.- should have two components.First for student who already subscribed for collage ride.on first component:- can see all the cars that in trip moving on the map.- can choose car from map to see its information (driver name, average speed and current speed).Second for request a special immediate ride.on second component:- can see all the cars that online moving on the map.- can request special ride.Driver functionality:- should be able to login.- should have two components.First for collage trips:- should be able to start collage trip.- should be able to end collage trip.Second for receive request to a special immediate ride.- can be online/offline to receive ride request from user.- receiving ride request that he can accept or reject.- displayed his special and collage rides history for last three days with rides information (date and time, path on map, average speed and timed bus stop location).Admin Requirement:- display list of all users.- display list of all drivers.- display list of all cars.- manage (add - edit - delete) driver.- manage (add - edit - delete) cars.- determined driver for each car.- display all drivers special and collage rides history for last three days with rides information (date and time, path on map, average speed and timed bus stop location).Important note: I need every single setting in the system to be dynamic from admin panelLike for example: location update in 5 seconds and I want to change it to be in every 10 seconds I can do it from the setting.Also I should receive all source code.
title: Transportation

desc: I require an android application built from scratch and presented as a working module, ready for use.COURIER-MAN (The app) basically creates a portal for persons', institutions and or organisations that any have parcels that need delivery to engage registered and accredited COURIER-MEN for their delivery services. The App should incorporated GPS for location purposes of both sender and courier to be located, payment options i.e. CASH mobile money payment options like MPESA, AIRTEL money etc, or VISA payment options. Courier options may include, the courier using public means of transport,walking/running, private means, Bicycle options, motorbike options.The developer is allowed to incorporate any additional features from the available transport applications available on the google play market.The developer should be willing to sign an NDA and should feel free to add any additional information/ options to better the app. Maintenance and improvements services to the application shall also be expected of the developer for about 2months after which an agreed fee shall be reached upon for the services rendered.
